components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.description:
See the thread dump below that shows the deadlock. client-worker-1 is holding 7b5a7fa5 and waiting on 1446a1e9. Thread-10-disruptor-worker-transfer-queue is holding 1446a1e9 and is waiting on 7b5a7fa5.

(Thread dump is truncated to show only the relevant parts)

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved
